sentence: In 2020, a businessperson he backed in North Carolina fell to now-Representative Madison Cawthorn.
author: David Catanese
title: Trump Is Making the Midterms a Referendum on Himself

sentence: North Carolina representative Madison Cawthorn, for example, was born in 1995.
author: Tony Wikrent
title: Wrap  Political Economy  January 2, 2022

sentence: Republican House members like Marjorie Taylor Greene, Madison Cawthorn and Lauren Boebert have learned that freshmen members of Congress can command outsized attention and that outrageous statements are a ticket, if not to policy success, then at least to the kind of attention and fundraising prowess that keeps a career alive."
author: Bill Berkowitz
title: She's Baaaack: Is Sarah Palin A relic from the past or viable congressional candidate?
